ygData.subject: OOC: Tired of the blitz-posting ...
ygData.msgSnippet: I m really sorry it s come to this, but the obsession with having the last word displayed by some members of the group is making it virtually impossible for me

Subject: OOC: Tired of the blitz-posting ...

X-Yahoo-Profile: cardhead649

I'm really sorry it's come to this, but the obsession with having the 
last word displayed by some members of the group is making it 
virtually impossible for me to keep up with this RPG.  When I sign 
on, all I ever see is strings of rapid-fire post exchanges between 
two individuals, which generally leaves a few characters miles ahead 
of everyone else in the timeline.  It's frustrating to find your 
characters dropped by the wayside simply because your limited windows 
of Internet time each day don't coincide with the rest of the group.

It's a great RPG on most fronts, but if this trend of forcing folks 
like me to weed through 20-40 posts a day and desperately try to play 
catch-up with our characters continues, well, you're going to be left 
with one less member.  I simply don't have the time or the patience 
to keep up with this much longer.  Those responsible for skewing this 
RPG in an annoying, unfair, and unrealistic manner should know who 
they are.

Council members, PLEASE put some sort of cap on the number of posts 
per character each day.  If nothing else, it gives everyone a chance 
to participate without fighting to get a word in edgewise.
